verses.name: Mark 8:27
verses.text: And Jesus went out, and his disciples, into the towns of Cesarea Philippi: and by the way he asked his disciples, saying unto them, Whom do men say that I am?

verses.name: Mark 8:28
verses.text: And they answered, John the Baptist: but some say, Elias; and others, One of the prophets.

verses.name: Mark 8:29
verses.text: And he saith unto them, But whom say ye that I am? And Peter answereth and saith unto him, Thou art the Christ.

verses.name: Mark 8:30
verses.text: And he charged them that they should tell no man of him.
